title: Ozak AI’s Fastest Growth Phase Triggers Listing Predictions — Could It Be the Next Breakout AI Token on Coinbase in 2025?
description: The fastest growth phase of Ozak AI has triggered anticipation that OZ could be the next breakout AI token on Coinbase in 2025.

title: Amplify Bloomberg AI Value Chain ETF (NYSEARCA:AIVC) Short Interest Update
description: Amplify Bloomberg AI Value Chain ETF (NYSEARCA:AIVC – Get Free Report) was the recipient of a significant decrease in short interest in December. As of December 15th, there was short interest totaling 381 shares, a decrease of 54.9% from the November 30th total of 845 shares. Approximately 0.1% of the company’s stock are sold short. [...]

title: China and America must get serious about AI risk
description: As AI capabilities advance, they could be used for cyberattacks on infrastructure, creating bioweapons, shaping disinformation campaigns, targeting lethal drones and more.

title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman Eyes Apple as Chief AI Rival with Jony Ive Hire
description: Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, views Apple as the primary AI rival, shifting focus from Google to hardware innovation. By recruiting designer Jony Ive, OpenAI aims to create a revolutionary consumer device that integrates AI seamlessly, potentially disrupting Apple's ecosystem dominance in personalized technology.

title: AI Changes Policing, City Emerges Maha Epicentre Of Tech Revolution
